data.value: If you do not have an Subscription for Layer Of Profit yet you can get one here:

data.name: label1.Text
data.value: SXTrader is using IMAP for accessing your mailbox and is looking for the daily tip mails from Layer Of Profit in your Inbox.

data.value: Minutes then play bet for given Lay Odd or Maximus Odd

data.value: If time until race start lower than

data.value: Dynamic Betting if there is an gap between back and lay odds greater than

data.value: Non Runners: Do not place bet.

data.value: If lay odds are greater than max. odds then place bet for max. odd
